item.title: About
item.description: A seasoned technical leader with many years of experience delivering technical solutions based on full stack, open source and proprietary technologies. Proven experience in full software life cycle development that includes design and development of Cloud, Cloud Management and Infrastructure and Data Center Automation solutions. Adept at delivering Center Automation solutions spanning concepts such as Containers, Networking, Configuration Management, Authentication/Authorization systems for some of the largest ISP’s and media companies around the world.
